item.description:
Join us as we ring in the New Year with Don't Call Me Shirley.

12/25 UPDATE: There is NO cover charge!

 

If you didn't join us for dinner then come on out and join us for a whole lotta dancing, laughter and FUN.

I will have more details as they are available, so remember to be watching your emails and come back to the event page for all the information, note the time may change so be prepared, this is a guess as they went on last year at 8:00, and this will give you time to get a parking spot and find us.

What I will be updating is:

--If this year they will have a cover charge?

--What the special items on the menu will be?

--What drink special's they will have?

As the date gets closer remember to check back so we are all on the same page.


IF you don't like crowds then this event may not be for you, please take that into consideration when signing up for this event.

This event will be scheduled on my 2 Meetup sites, (Our Circle of Friends and Connection & Friends) be prepared there may be more people going from the group than you see.

Take a minute now and put the Meetup phone into your phone, that way if you are are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, you already have it in your phone:  978-304-2811, please note this phone does not accept text messages.

Is it time for you to pay your dues?  Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can pay your dues at any event.  Thank you in advance for paying your dues!

Snow may cancel this event please remember to check back to see if we are still going to this event.

As a courtesy to everyone in the group come back to the event page and change your RSVP if your plans change or call me/send a message through the site.

So don't stay home alone on New Year's Eve, come out and join us for a great night of fun.

Hope to see you all at Michael's!
Donna
item.how_to_find_us: Come on up and find us upstairs to the right.
item.name: Welcome in the New Year with friends and Don't Call Me Shirley
